trans-unit.source: Specifies the modifiability value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute" /> for a binary XAML (BAML) class or class member.
trans-unit.target: 為二進位 XAML (BAML) 類別或類別成員指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute" /> 的可修改性值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute> attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute>屬性可以套用至類別、 屬性或方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用當地語系化屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[當地語系化屬性和註解](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the modifiability value of localization attributes defined for a button.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示定義按鈕的當地語系化屬性的可修改性值。

trans-unit.source: Targeted value modifiability is inherited from its parent node.
trans-unit.target: 目標值可修改性繼承自其父節點。

trans-unit.source: Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化者可修改目標值。

trans-unit.source: Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化者無法修改目標值。
